name: Go
overview: GO for the Macintosh lets you: • learn the fundamentals of the game by playing against the computer, or against your friends • save and replay published games • learn from famous games • choose among different size boards in 2D and 3D • play matches via modem Invented in China some 4000 years ago, the rules are extremely simple, yet the strategic choices almost infinite... GO. The Ultimate Game of Strategy.
